original_text: So Jacob served seven years to get Rachel, but they seemed like only a few days to him because of his love for her.
korean_text: 야곱이 라헬을 위하여 칠 년 동안 라반을 섬겼으나 그를 사랑하는 까닭에 칠 년을 며칠 같이 여겼더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱은 칠 년 동안 섬겼다

sentences.original_text: but they seemed like only a few days to him
because of his love for her
